text: Yaqeenan hum ney Musa (alh-e-salam) ko kitab di thi so uss mein bhi ikhtilaf kiya gaya aur agar (woh) baat na hoti (jo) aap kay rab ki taraf say pehlay hi muqarrar ho chuki hai to unkay darmiyan (kabhi ka) faisla ho chuka hota yeh log to iss kay baray mein boht sakht bey-shain kerney walay shak mein hain
